mapper.insert: insert into ICONTENTS_ARTICLE values(null, #{obj.title}, #{obj.summary}, #{obj.visits}, #{obj.image}, #{obj.weight}, now(), now(), #{obj.createUserId}, #{obj.rating}, #{obj.ratingCount}, #{obj.published}, #{obj.updateUserId}, #{obj.catalogId}, #{obj.supportCount}, #{obj.opposeCount}, #{obj.metaKeywords}, #{obj.metaDescription}, #{obj.layout}, #{obj.name}, #{obj.alias} )
mapper.update: update ICONTENTS_ARTICLE set title=#{obj.title}, summary=#{obj.summary}, visits=#{obj.visits}, image=#{obj.image}, weight=#{obj.weight}, updateTime=now(), rating=#{obj.rating}, ratingCount=#{obj.ratingCount}, published=#{obj.published}, updateUserId=#{obj.updateUserId}, catalogId=#{obj.catalogId}, supportCount=#{obj.supportCount}, opposeCount=#{obj.opposeCount}, metaKeywords=#{obj.metaKeywords}, metaDescription=#{obj.metaDescription}, layout=#{obj.layout}, name=#{obj.name}, alias=#{obj.alias} where id=#{obj.id}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, (SELECT USERNAME FROM ICONTENTS_USER U WHERE a.CREATEUSERID=U.ID) CREATOR, (SELECT USERNAME FROM ICONTENTS_USER U WHERE a.UPDATEUSERID=U.ID) UPDATER, (SELECT NAME FROM ICONTENTS_CATALOG C WHERE A.CATALOGID=C.ID) CATALOG FROM ICONTENTS_article a ORDER BY updateTime DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{size}
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ID),-1) FROM ICONTENTS_ARTICLE WHERE ALIAS=#{alias}
